description: React component for executing a test script with progress simulation, logging, and control buttons.

methods.name: appendLog
methods.description: Appends a timestamped log line to the logs state.

methods.name: startRun
methods.description: Starts the simulated execution, updating progress and logs.

methods.name: cancelRun
methods.description: Cancels the ongoing execution and logs the cancellation.

methods.name: resetRun
methods.description: Resets the execution state and logs.

methods.name: statusText
methods.description: Returns a string representing the current execution status.
